name: Hotels com Provider
description: Search hotels, see prices, photos of the hotels, reviews.  **Site:** www.hotels.com **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel api:** https://rapi.one

api_methods.name: Hotel Slug convert
api_methods.description: Get Hotel ID from Hotel Site slug, (https://hotels.com/ho219115) `ho219115` -> `1105156`

api_methods.name: Domains List
api_methods.description: Get a list of Domains, available domains code, currencies and locales

api_methods.name: Hotels Search
api_methods.description: Get hotels by the filter. Set the `domain`, it is necessary for localization at the currency setting. (meta / Domains List). `accessibility` parameter, needed to get ONLY available hotels. Indicate the `region_id` -> use `Region Search`, check-in and check-out date, number of adults and children

parameters.name: children_ages
parameters.description: The age of every child. Indicate their ages separated by commas. `4,0,15` -> three kids. `0` - less than a year

utterances.utterance: Find me a hotel in Paris for two adults checking in on October 10th and out on October 15th, with a pool and free breakfast.
Show me available hotels in New York for a family of four, checking in on December 1st and out on December 5th, with a minimum guest rating of 9.
I need a hotel in Tokyo for one adult, checking in on November 20th and out on November 25th, with a balcony or terrace and accessible parking.
Find a hotel in London for three adults, checking in on January 5th and out on January 10th, with a price range of 50 to 300.
Can you find a hotel in Sydney for two adults and one child, checking in on March 15th and out on March 20th, with a spa on site?
I want to book a hotel in Dubai for two adults, checking in on February 10th and out on February 15th, with a gym and free cancellation.
Look for a hotel in Rome for one adult, checking in on April 1st and out on April 5th, with a hot tub and a star rating of 4 or 5.
Find a hotel in Barcelona for two adults, checking in on May 10th and out on May 15th, with a kitchen and half board meal plan.
Show me hotels in Berlin for two adults, checking in on June 1st and out on June 6th, with a water park and pay later option.
I need a hotel in Amsterdam for three adults, checking in on July 10th and out on July 15th, with a casino and all-inclusive meal plan.

api_methods.name: Hotel Rooms (offers)
api_methods.description: Get available rooms at the hotel

parameters.name: children_ages
parameters.description: The age of every child. If children will be staying in the room, please indicate their ages separated by commas. 0-less than a year
